crossroads.text: You find yourself standing at a crossroads, surrounded by mist. The signpost is barely legible, but you manage to make out three paths: one leading to the fairy realm, another to the gates of hell, and the last one to the heavenly kingdom. Which path do you choose?

fairyRealm.text: You enter the fairy realm, a place of enchantment and wonder. The air is filled with the sweet scent of flowers, and colorful butterflies flutter around you. You spot a fairy hovering nearby, beckoning you to follow her.

options.text: Explore the realm on your own

followFairy.text: You follow the fairy through the magical realm, discovering hidden glades and sparkling streams along the way. Eventually, you arrive at the fairy queen's palace, where she welcomes you warmly.

acceptInvitation.text: The fairy queen invites you to a grand feast, where you meet other fairies and creatures of the realm. You spend a joyous evening dancing and feasting, feeling like you've found a second home.

options.text: Stay in the fairy realm forever

stayForever.text: You decide to stay in the fairy realm forever, living among the fairies and experiencing endless magic and wonder.

returnToWorld.text: You bid farewell to the fairy realm and return to the mortal world, carrying with you memories of your adventure.

exploreRealm.text: You explore the fairy realm on your own, discovering its secrets and meeting its inhabitants. You have many adventures and learn much about yourself and the world around you.

continueExploring.text: You continue to explore the fairy realm, encountering new wonders and challenges at every turn. Your journey is never-ending, filled with excitement and discovery.

gatesOfHell.text: You approach the gates of hell, a foreboding sight surrounded by flames and guarded by demons. The air is thick with the smell of sulfur, and you can hear the screams of the damned.

enterHell.text: You enter hell, braving the flames and the demons. The landscape is a twisted, nightmarish version of the mortal world, filled with suffering and despair.

options.text: Seek out the ruler of hell
Try to find a way out

seekRulerOfHell.text: You seek out the ruler of hell, a powerful demon known as the Lord of Darkness. He offers you a deal: join him in his reign of terror, and you will be granted great power and riches.

acceptOfferHell.text: You accept the ruler of hell's offer, becoming his servant and embracing the darkness. You wield great power, but at a terrible cost.

rejectOfferHell.text: You reject the ruler of hell's offer, refusing to embrace the darkness. You continue to search for a way out of hell, determined to escape its grasp.

options.text: Find a way out of hell

findWayOutOfHell.text: You search for a way out of hell, navigating its treacherous landscape and evading its demons. After much struggle, you finally find a portal back to the mortal world.

turnBackFromHell.text: You decide to turn back from the gates of hell, unwilling to risk your soul in its fiery depths. You choose another path, wondering what other adventures await you.

heavenlyKingdom.text: You ascend to the heavenly kingdom, a place of beauty and serenity. The air is filled with the sound of angelic voices, and the light is warm and comforting.

enterHeaven.text: You enter the heavenly kingdom, where you are greeted by angels and loved ones who have passed on. You feel a sense of peace and belonging unlike anything you've ever experienced.

stayForeverHeaven.text: You decide to stay in heaven forever, basking in its beauty and serenity for all eternity.

returnToWorld.text: You bid farewell to the heavenly kingdom and return to the mortal world, carrying with you the memory of its beauty and peace.

alternateReality.text: You find yourself in an alternate reality, where everything is similar yet different. The sky is a different color, and the flora and fauna have unusual characteristics.

options.text: Try to find a way back to your own reality

exploreAlternateReality.text: As you explore the alternate reality, you encounter strange creatures and landscapes unlike anything you've ever seen. You marvel at the diversity of this world and wonder about its origins.

options.text: Try to find a way back to your own reality

keepExploringAlternateReality.text: You continue to explore the alternate reality, discovering new wonders and facing new challenges. Each day brings new adventures and discoveries.

options.text: Try to find a way back to your own reality

findWayBackToReality.text: You search for a way back to your own reality, seeking out clues and information that might lead you back home. After much searching, you find a portal that seems to lead back to your world.

stayInAlternateReality.text: You decide to stay in the alternate reality, embracing the differences and finding new adventures in this strange yet fascinating world.
